subject: Re: Dear Sir/Madam,
body:
Dear Madeline,

TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN:

We are surprised to receive your email this late as it has been a while we did send you this message (since last year) and we had hoped you have collected the Cashier's Check of US$500,000.00 from Mr. Toya Toshio by now. You are also emailing of from a totally new email address. In order to be sure it's you, please send your full names, old email address and contact address to him immediately for the dispatch of the Cashier's Check to you

Late Kunio has before his death directed that you be compensated from his estate/assets, so please contact the below stated person to receive your reward:

Name:  Mr. Toya Toshio
Email:  toyatoshia@gmail.com
Country/Address: Cambodia

Ask him to send you the Cashier's Check of US$500,000.00 (Five Hundred Thousand US Dollars) which is meant for your compensation for all efforts and attempts to assist in the matter. Kindly cooperate with him and reconfirm your current address to him to enable him send you the Check immediately.

Regards,
Mr. J. B. Ansley
Principal Partner
ANSLEY & ASSOCIATES
(Attorneys-At-Law, Notary Public, Solicitors And Advocates)
1269 Terry Rd. Winston Salem, NC 27107, USA.


Re: Dear Sir/Madam,
Inbox
tw52680@***.com
10:33â€¯AM (46 minutes ago)
to me

Hello Mr. J. B. Ansley,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the late Mr. Kunio Uematsu's estate and his charitable intentions. I am deeply touched by his generosity and willingness to contribute towards charity works.

I must admit, I'm a bit surprised as I don't recall having any previous interactions with Mr. Uematsu or being involved in any charity works on his behalf. Could you please provide more details about this? How did Mr. Uematsu come to know about me and why did he choose me for this noble cause?

Also, could you please elaborate on the process that was initiated but not completed? What exactly does it entail?

You mentioned a certain Mr. Toya Toshio who is supposed to send me a Cashier's Check of US Five Hundred Thousand Dollars. Could you tell me more about him and his role in this matter?

I appreciate your assistance in helping me understand this situation better.
Best wishes,
Madeline
